overview_of_class: Is the future of news 100% mobile ? or 100% on Facebook? Is content still king ? and if not, how do we deal with the new rulers? When distracted news consumers prefer convenience to quality, how do journalists break through? Explore these questions, as well as the financial and technological underpinnings of the media business, in this course that is designed to prepare you for whatever changes come next. The key is learning to think not just differently, but innovatively.
name: How 21st Century Media Work
title: JOUR JOUR 461-0-20 How 21st Century Media Work
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
